page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE-BY BEN
page.content: I start the day the same old way. Mum wakes me up and I lie in bed for a little bit longer. I have a wash and get dressed. I go down stairs and comb my hair which Dad normally reminds me about. I get the Alpen and have my breakfast. I do my teeth and put my shoes on. At 8.45 I am on my way to school. Some times I meet Gavin on my way. When I get to school I play football till the bell rings. We go in and do our maths then go to play and when we come in again we do some English. We normally write a story and then we have our dinner. I try and get in first so I can get some fish and chips with peas. Then when the bell rings we do topic and have a story to finsh the day. I go home and do my cornet practice then I watch TV till tea time. After tea I watch TV till 9 o clock. Then I go to bed.
